entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 16.
